Groundtruth:
import fitz
import PDFbf

# Task 1
filepath = "Design_8H2K.pdf"
doc = fitz.open(filepath)

# Annotation extractor
annoextractor = PDFbf.extractanno(doc=doc)

# Page number
pagenumber = 7  # Page 8 in 0-indexed format

# Rectangle order
rectangleorder = 4  # Rectangle 5 in 0-indexed format

# Extract rectangle and reference point
rectangle, rfpoint = annoextractor.getclip_rfpoint(pagenumber=pagenumber, rectangleorder=rectangleorder)

# Argument collection for vertical text with specified font size
argument = dict(clip=rectangle, rotate=90, fontsize=12)

# Manipulate text
Text_manipulator = PDFbf.manipulate_text(
    doc=doc,
    pagenumber=pagenumber,
    clip=argument.get("clip"),
    rotate=argument.get("rotate"),
    fontsize=argument.get("fontsize")
)
Text_manipulator.text = Text_manipulator.getvertext()
doc = Text_manipulator.addtext()

# Save the updated file
updatedfilepath = filepath[:-4] + "_updated.pdf"
doc.save(updatedfilepath)
